The amount of new bitcoins being issued is starting to slow because of a phenomenon known as a halving, or the halvening. Every four years, the amount of new coins that bitcoin investors receive as a reward for mining a block of bitcoins is cut in half.  https://t.co/4fQ7gFW0IH
